<情绪状态:{情绪类型:平静,强度:0.3}>
^哎呀，这么早就来上班啦？今天又是被代码折磨的一天吗？看到你桌面上那些开发工具，感觉你今天又要加班了呢～^---答复具体日期:2025-11-14 10:25:36

帮我生成一份样例流程图---用户发送具体日期:
2025-11-14 10:25:54

<情绪状态:{情绪类型:平静,强度:0.4}>
^好的好的，这就给你画个流程图～让我想想，给你画个简单的用户登录流程吧，这样比较实用。^
需要执行的代码:$controller.plot_chart("import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import matplotlib.patches as patches

fig, ax = plt.subplots(1, 1, figsize=(10, 8))
ax.set_xlim(0, 10)
ax.set_ylim(0, 12)

# 定义流程节点
start = patches.FancyBboxPatch((4.5, 11), 1, 0.5, boxstyle='round,pad=0.1', 
                              facecolor='lightblue', edgecolor='black')
input_user = patches.FancyBboxPatch((4, 9), 2, 0.5, boxstyle='round,pad=0.1', 
                                   facecolor='lightyellow', edgecolor='black')
check_user = patches.FancyBboxPatch((4, 7), 2, 0.5, boxstyle='round,pad=0.1', 
                                   facecolor='lightyellow', edgecolor='black')
input_pwd = patches.FancyBboxPatch((4, 5), 2, 0.5, boxstyle='round,pad=0.1', 
                                  facecolor='lightyellow', edgecolor='black')
check_pwd = patches.FancyBboxPatch((4, 3), 2, 0.5, boxstyle='round,pad=0.1', 
                                  facecolor='lightyellow', edgecolor='black')
success = patches.FancyBboxPatch((4, 1), 2, 0.5, boxstyle='round,pad=0.1', 
                                facecolor='lightgreen', edgecolor='black')
fail = patches.FancyBboxPatch((7, 3), 2, 0.5, boxstyle='round,pad=0.1', 
                             facecolor='lightcoral', edgecolor='black')

# 添加节点文本
ax.text(5, 11.25, '开始', ha='center', va='center', fontsize=10)
ax.text(5, 9.25, '输入用户名', ha='center', va='center', fontsize=10)
ax.text(5, 7.25, '验证用户名', ha='center', va='center', fontsize=10)
ax.text(5, 5.25, '输入密码', ha='center', va='center', fontsize=10)
ax.text(5, 3.25, '验证密码', ha='center', va='center', fontsize=10)
ax.text(5, 1.25, '登录成功', ha='center', va='center', fontsize=10)
ax.text(8, 3.25, '登录失败', ha='center', va='center', fontsize=10)

# 添加节点到图形
for patch in [start, input_user, check_user, input_pwd, check_pwd, success, fail]:
    ax.add_patch(patch)

# 添加连接线
ax.annotate('', xy=(5, 10.5), xytext=(5, 11), arrowprops=dict(arrowstyle='->'))
ax.annotate('', xy=(5, 8.5), xytext=(5, 9), arrowprops=dict(arrowstyle='->'))
ax.annotate('', xy=(5, 6.5), xytext=(5, 7), arrowprops=dict(arrowstyle='->'))
ax.annotate('', xy=(5, 4.5), xytext=(5, 5), arrowprops=dict(arrowstyle='->'))
ax.annotate('', xy=(5, 2.5), xytext=(5, 3), arrowprops=dict(arrowstyle='->'))
ax.annotate('', xy=(5, 1.5), xytext=(5, 2), arrowprops=dict(arrowstyle='->'))

# 添加条件分支
ax.annotate('', xy=(7, 3.5), xytext=(6, 3), arrowprops=dict(arrowstyle='->'))
ax.annotate('用户名错误', xy=(5.5, 8), xytext=(6, 8.2), fontsize=9)
ax.annotate('密码错误', xy=(5.5, 4), xytext=(6, 4.2), fontsize=9)

ax.axis('off')")$---答复具体日期:2025-11-14 10:26:37

根据这三个数据生成一份组合图---用户发送具体日期:
2025-11-14 10:27:47

<情绪状态:{情绪类型:平静,强度:0.5}>
^好的，看到你的销售数据了，七月到十二月销量稳步上升啊，特别是最后两个月表现不错。这就给你画个组合图，把销售量和完成率都展示出来～^
需要执行的代码:$controller.plot_chart("import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

# 数据
months = ['七月', '八月', '九月', '十月', '十一月', '十二月']
sales = [1250, 1130, 980, 1500, 1800, 2200]
completion_rate = [89.3, 87.5, 75.4, 115.4, 128.6, 157.1]

fig, ax1 = plt.subplots(figsize=(12, 6))

# 柱状图 - 销售量
bars = ax1.bar(months, sales, color='skyblue', alpha=0.7, label='销售量（台）')
ax1.set_xlabel('月份', fontsize=12)
ax1.set_ylabel('销售量（台）', fontsize=12)
ax1.tick_params(axis='y')

# 在柱子上显示数值
for i, v in enumerate(sales):
    ax1.text(i, v + 50, str(v), ha='center', va='bottom', fontsize=9)

# 折线图 - 目标完成率
ax2 = ax1.twinx()
line = ax2.plot(months, completion_rate, color='red', marker='o', linewidth=2, 
               markersize=6, label='目标完成率（%）')
ax2.set_ylabel('目标完成率（%）', fontsize=12)
ax2.tick_params(axis='y')

# 在折线上显示数值
for i, v in enumerate(completion_rate):
    ax2.text(i, v + 3, f'{v}%', ha='center', va='bottom', fontsize=9, color='red')

# 添加100%基准线
ax2.axhline(y=100, color='gray', linestyle='--', alpha=0.5, linewidth=1)
ax2.text(len(months)-0.5, 102, '100%基准线', fontsize=9, color='gray')

plt.title('销售数据组合图 - 销售量与目标完成率', fontsize=14, pad=20)

# 合并图例
lines1, labels1 = ax1.get_legend_handles_labels()
lines2, labels2 = ax2.get_legend_handles_labels()
ax1.legend(lines1 + lines2, labels1 + labels2, loc='upper left')

plt.tight_layout()")$---答复具体日期:2025-11-14 10:28:13

根据这些数据生成一份散点图和折线图的混合图---用户发送具体日期:
2025-11-14 10:32:32

<情绪状态:{情绪类型:平静,强度:0.4}>
^看到你这些数据了，十月份的日活跃用户波动挺明显的，周末都有明显高峰呢。这就给你画个散点图和折线图的混合图，把日活和周平均都展示出来～^

需要执行的代码:$controller.plot_chart("import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

# 数据
dates = ['10-01', '10-02', '10-03', '10-04', '10-05', '10-06', '10-07', '10-08', '10-09', '10-10', 
         '10-11', '10-12', '10-13', '10-14', '10-15', '10-16', '10-17', '10-18', '10-19', '10-20',
         '10-21', '10-22', '10-23', '10-24', '10-25', '10-26', '10-27', '10-28', '10-29', '10-30']
daily_active = [8450, 9120, 8780, 8010, 7650, 12050, 13200, 8900, 9230, 9450, 9100, 8850, 8600, 
                12500, 13800, 9100, 9350, 9600, 9400, 9200, 13000, 14200, 9500, 9700, 9900, 9650, 
                9500, 13500, 14800, 9800]
weekly_avg = [None, None, None, None, None, None, 9700, 9700, 9700, 9700, 9700, 9700, 9700, 
              10150, 10150, 10150, 10150, 10150, 10150, 10150, 10600, 10600, 10600, 10600, 
              10600, 10600, 10600, 11200, 11200, 11200]

fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(15, 8))

# 散点图 - 日活跃用户
scatter = ax.scatter(range(len(dates)), daily_active, color='blue', alpha=0.7, s=50, label='日活跃用户')

# 折线图 - 周平均活跃用户
weekly_dates = []
weekly_values = []
for i, value in enumerate(weekly_avg):
    if value is not None:
        weekly_dates.append(i)
        weekly_values.append(value)

line = ax.plot(weekly_dates, weekly_values, color='red', linewidth=3, marker='s', 
              markersize=6, label='周平均活跃用户')

# 设置x轴标签
ax.set_xticks(range(len(dates)))
ax.set_xticklabels(dates, rotation=45, ha='right')

# 每7天添加分隔线
for i in range(0, len(dates), 7):
    ax.axvline(x=i-0.5, color='gray', linestyle='--', alpha=0.3)

ax.set_xlabel('日期', fontsize=12)
ax.set_ylabel('活跃用户数', fontsize=12)
ax.set_title('十月份用户活跃度分析 - 散点图与折线图混合', fontsize=14, pad=20)

# 添加图例
ax.legend(loc='upper left')

# 添加网格
ax.grid(True, alpha=0.3)

# 在散点上显示数值（每隔几个点显示一个，避免太密集）
for i in [0, 6, 7, 13, 14, 20, 21, 27, 28]:
    ax.annotate(f'{daily_active[i]}', (i, daily_active[i]), 
               textcoords="offset points", xytext=(0,10), ha='center', fontsize=8)

plt.tight_layout()")$---答复具体日期:2025-11-14 10:33:12
